actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of September 26, 1950, to enlarge the service area of the Sacramento canals unit of the Central Valley project to include Yolo and Solano Counties, Calif.

summary.text: Enlarges the service unit of the Sacramento, California, canals unit of the Central Valley project to include the Will S. Green Canal, and Yolo and Solano Counties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of September 26, 1950, to enlarge the service area of the Sacramento canals unit of the Central Valley project to include Yolo and Solano Counties, Calif.
